amendment.description: Amendment changed the language in the bill prohibiting the use of eminent domain by the Federal government to specifically prohibit the Federal government from acquiring for the trail, from State or local governments, land acquired by a State or local government through its own use of eminent domain.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 110-744 to amend the language in the bill prohibiting the use of eminent domain by the Federal government to specifically prohibit the Federal government from acquiring, for the trail, from State or local governments, land acquired by a State or local government through its own use of eminent domain.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
